titles.title: Manguwa Shin Saru Kani Gassen
新猿蟹合戦
Shin Saru Kani Kassen
マングワ 新猿蟹合戰
Monkey and Crabs

anime.description: Crabs band together to get right of an ape in their peach tree after it keeps stealing their food and hitting them with the fruits to the point where one gets severely injured.
